scenario_text.value:
Oh, Takuma! Look over there! Isn’t that
Shuuji?!
You’re right! And Lopmon’s with him!

Yeah, but... Shoot, they’re on the other side
of the waterway. Gotta find a way around.

Huh? The gas is swirling around Shuuji, and
he’s...looking at a vision?

We have to hurry, Takuma! This looks pretty
dangerous!

Yeah, you’re right. We have to head over to
the other side!
